org.apache.openmeetings.webservice

Class UserWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.UserWebService

  • @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
@Path(value="/user")
public class UserWebService
extends Object
    The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter conference rooms, recordings or the application in general
    Author:
    sebawagner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserWebService()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Long addNewUser(String SID, String username, String userpass, String lastname, String firstname, String email, String additionalname, String street, String zip, String fax, long states_id, String town, long language_id)
      Adds a new Usre like through the Frontend, but also does activates the Account To do SSO see the methods to create a hash and use those ones!
      Long addNewUserWithExternalType(String SID, String username, String userpass, String lastname, String firstname, String email, String additionalname, String street, String zip, String fax, long states_id, String town, long language_id, String jNameTimeZone, String externalUserId, String externalUserType)
      Adds a new User like through the Frontend, but also does activates the Account, sends NO email (no matter what you configured) and sets the users external user id and type Use the methods to create a hash for SSO, creating users is not required for SSO
      Long addNewUserWithTimeZone(String SID, String username, String userpass, String lastname, String firstname, String email, String additionalname, String street, String zip, String fax, long states_id, String town, long language_id, String jNameTimeZone)

      Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room.
      String setUserObjectMainLandingZone(String SID, String username, String firstname, String lastname, String profilePictureUrl, String email, String externalUserId, String externalUserType)
      Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID and directly login into the dashboard ++ the user can press f5 to reload the page / use the link several times, the SOAP Gateway does remember the IP of the user and the will only the first user that enters the room allow to re-enter.

        public UserWebService()

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        @GET
@Path(value="/session")
public Sessiondata getSession()
        load this session id before doing anything else Returns an Object of Type Sessiondata, this contains a sessionId, use that sessionId in all Methods
        Returns:
        - creates new session

      • loginUser

        public Long loginUser(String SID,
             String username,
             String userpass)
        Auth function, use the SID you get by getSession, return positive means logged-in, if negative its an ErrorCode, you have to invoke the Method getErrorByCode to get the Text-Description of that ErrorCode
        Parameters:
        SID - - The SID from getSession
        username - - Username from OpenMeetings, the user has to have Admin-rights
        userpass - - Userpass from OpenMeetings
        Returns:
        - id of the logged in user, -1 in case of the error

      • getErrorByCode

        public ErrorResult getErrorByCode(String SID,
                         long errorid,
                         long langId)
        loads an Error-Object. If a Method returns a negative Result, its an Error-id, it needs a language_id to specify in which language you want to display/read the error-message. English has the Language-ID one, for different one see the list of languages
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        errorid - the error id (negative Value here!)
        langId - The id of the language
        Returns:
        - error with the code given

      • addNewUser

        public Long addNewUser(String SID,
              String username,
              String userpass,
              String lastname,
              String firstname,
              String email,
              String additionalname,
              String street,
              String zip,
              String fax,
              long states_id,
              String town,
              long language_id)
                throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Adds a new Usre like through the Frontend, but also does activates the Account To do SSO see the methods to create a hash and use those ones!
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        userpass - any userpass
        lastname - any lastname
        firstname - any firstname
        email - any email
        additionalname - any additionalname
        street - any street
        zip - any zip
        fax - any fax
        states_id - a valid states_id
        town - any town
        language_id - the language_id
        Returns:
        - id of the user added or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

        zip - any zip
        fax - any fax
        states_id - a valid states_id
        town - any town

        jNameTimeZone - the name of the timezone for the user
        Returns:

                                throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Adds a new User like through the Frontend, but also does activates the Account, sends NO email (no matter what you configured) and sets the users external user id and type Use the methods to create a hash for SSO, creating users is not required for SSO

        SID - The SID from getSession

        userpass - any userpass

        firstname - any firstname

        town - any town
        language_id - the language_id
        jNameTimeZone - the name of the timezone for the user
        externalUserId - externalUserId
        externalUserType - externalUserType
        Returns:
        - id of user added or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

                  Long userId)

        Parameters:

        externalUserType - externalUserId
        Returns:

      • setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash

        public String setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash(String SID,
                                      String username,
                                      String firstname,
                                      String lastname,
                                      String profilePictureUrl,
                                      String email,
                                      String externalUserId,
                                      String externalUserType,
                                      Long room_id,
                                      int becomeModeratorAsInt,
                                      int showAudioVideoTestAsInt)
                                        throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room. ... Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        firstname - any firstname
        lastname - any lastname
        profilePictureUrl - any profilePictureUrl
        email - any email
        externalUserId - if you have any external user Id you may set it here
        externalUserType - you can specify your system-name here, for example "moodle"
        room_id - the room id the user should be logged in
        becomeModeratorAsInt - 0 means no Moderator, 1 means Moderator
        showAudioVideoTestAsInt - 0 means don't show Audio/Video Test, 1 means show Audio/Video Test Application before the user is logged into the room
        Returns:
        - secure hash or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHashByURL

        public String setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHashByURL(String SID,
                                           String username,
                                           String firstname,
                                           String lastname,
                                           String profilePictureUrl,
                                           String email,
                                           String externalUserId,
                                           String externalUserType,
                                           Long room_id,
                                           int becomeModeratorAsInt,
                                           int showAudioVideoTestAsInt)
                                             throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room. ++ the user can press f5 to reload the page / use the link several times, the SOAP Gateway does remember the IP of the user and the will only the first user that enters the room allow to re-enter. ... Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        firstname - any firstname
        lastname - any lastname
        profilePictureUrl - any profilePictureUrl
        email - any email any email
        externalUserId - if you have any external user Id you may set it here
        externalUserType - you can specify your system-name here, for example "moodle"
        room_id - the room id the user should be logged in
        becomeModeratorAsInt - 0 means no Moderator, 1 means Moderator
        showAudioVideoTestAsInt - 0 means don't show Audio/Video Test, 1 means show Audio/Video Test Application before the user is logged into the room
        Returns:
        - secure hash or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHashByURLAndRecFlag

        public String setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHashByURLAndRecFlag(String SID,
                                                     String username,
                                                     String firstname,
                                                     String lastname,
                                                     String profilePictureUrl,
                                                     String email,
                                                     String externalUserId,
                                                     String externalUserType,
                                                     Long room_id,
                                                     int becomeModeratorAsInt,
                                                     int showAudioVideoTestAsInt,
                                                     int allowRecording)
        Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room. ++ the user can press f5 to reload the page / use the link several times, the SOAP Gateway does remember the IP of the user and the will only the first user that enters the room allow to re-enter. ... Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used. ++ sets the flag if the user can do recording in the conference room
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        firstname - any firstname
        lastname - any lastname
        profilePictureUrl - any profilePictureUrl
        email - any email
        externalUserId - if you have any external user Id you may set it here
        externalUserType - you can specify your system-name here, for example "moodle"
        room_id - the room id the user should be logged in
        becomeModeratorAsInt - 0 means no Moderator, 1 means Moderator
        showAudioVideoTestAsInt - 0 means don't show Audio/Video Test, 1 means show Audio/Video Test Application before the user is logged into the room
        allowRecording - 0 means don't allow Recording, 1 means allow Recording
        Returns:
        - secure hash or error code

      • setUserObjectMainLandingZone

        public String setUserObjectMainLandingZone(String SID,
                                  String username,
                                  String firstname,
                                  String lastname,
                                  String profilePictureUrl,
                                  String email,
                                  String externalUserId,
                                  String externalUserType)
        Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID and directly login into the dashboard ++ the user can press f5 to reload the page / use the link several times, the SOAP Gateway does remember the IP of the user and the will only the first user that enters the room allow to re-enter. ... Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        firstname - any firstname
        lastname - any lastname
        profilePictureUrl - any absolute profilePictureUrl
        email - any email
        externalUserId - if you have any external user Id you may set it here
        externalUserType - you can specify your system-name here, for example "moodle"
        Returns:
        - secure hash or error code

      • setUserAndNickName

        public String setUserAndNickName(String SID,
                        String username,
                        String firstname,
                        String lastname,
                        String profilePictureUrl,
                        String email,
                        String externalUserId,
                        String externalUserType,
                        Long room_id,
                        int becomeModeratorAsInt,
                        int showAudioVideoTestAsInt,
                        int showNickNameDialogAsInt)
        Description: sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room. ++ the user can press f5 to reload the page / use the link several times, the SOAP Gateway does remember the IP of the user and the will only the first user that enters the room allow to re-enter. ... Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used. ++ Additionally you can set a param showNickNameDialogAsInt, the effect if that param is 1 is, that the user gets a popup where he can enter his nickname right before he enters the conference room. All nicknames and emails users enter are logged in the conferencelog table.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        firstname - any firstname
        lastname - any lastname
        profilePictureUrl - any profilePictureUrl
        email - any email
        externalUserId - if you have any external user Id you may set it here
        externalUserType - you can specify your system-name here, for example "moodle"
        room_id - the room id the user should be logged in
        becomeModeratorAsInt - 0 means no Moderator, 1 means Moderator
        showAudioVideoTestAsInt - 0 means don't show Audio/Video Test, 1 means show Audio/Video Test Application before the user is logged into the room
        showNickNameDialogAsInt - 0 means do not show the popup to enter a nichname, 1 means that there is a popup to enter the nickname for the conference
        Returns:
        - secure hash, or error code

      • setUserObjectAndGenerateRecordingHashByURL

        public String setUserObjectAndGenerateRecordingHashByURL(String SID,
                                                String username,
                                                String firstname,
                                                String lastname,
                                                String externalUserId,
                                                String externalUserType,
                                                Long recording_id)
        Use this method to access a Recording instead of Room
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        username - any username
        firstname - any firstname
        lastname - any lastname
        externalUserId - if you have any external user Id you may set it here
        externalUserType - you can specify your system-name here, for example "moodle"
        recording_id - the id of the recording, get a List of all Recordings with RoomService::getFlvRecordingByExternalRoomType
        Returns:
        - hash of the recording, or error id

      • addUserToOrganisation

        public Long addUserToOrganisation(String SID,
                         Long user_id,
                         Long organisation_id,
                         Long insertedby)
        Add a user to a certain organization
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        user_id - the user id
        organisation_id - the organization id
        insertedby - user id of the operating user
        Returns:
        - id of the user added, or error id in case of the error

      • getUsersByOrganisation

        public SearchResult<User> getUsersByOrganisation(String SID,
                                        long organisation_id,
                                        int start,
                                        int max,
                                        String orderby,
                                        boolean asc)
        Search users and return them
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        organisation_id - the organization id
        start - first record
        max - max records
        orderby - orderby clause
        asc - asc or desc
        Returns:
        - users found

      • kickUserByPublicSID

        public Boolean kickUserByPublicSID(String SID,
                          String publicSID)
        Kick a user by its public SID
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        publicSID - the publicSID (you can get it from the call to get users in a room)
        Returns:
        - true if user was kicked

      • addOrganisation

        public Long addOrganisation(String SID,
                   String name)
                     throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        add a new organisation
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from getSession
        name - the name of the org
        Returns:
        the new id of the org or -1 in case an error happened
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
